body: Still waiting for the little sister chapter
For now, I'm just gonna loosely follow this series since it's been so crazy with so many couples going on and the OG MCs are currently being sidelined.

Yeh I don't like series with multiple protagonists. It's fine with TV series and live action but idk what it's about anime, I don't like seeing getting other people than MC getting laid. Probably because I know that harem in anime exists, and there's a chance MC can bed them all even if he doesn't end up with them.
Yea, this isn't even about the MC anymore. It seems like there are more chapters about other dudes getting laid than the MC. Even the cover for it isn't the main girl, but a side characters girl.
Is it finally going to end? Feels like everyone has their own partner now. Unless another childhood friend comes along. Kind of strange this didnt end up as a harem plot.
